block.box: Each of the events or occurrences set out in clauses 18.2 to 18.18 inclusive is an Event of
Default (whether or not caused by any reason whatsoever outside the control of the Borrower
or any other person), provided that in the case of any of the events or occurrences referred to
in clause 18 which relates to a member of the Group other than the Borrower, then the
occurrence of such event shall not constitute an Event of Default unless, in the reasonable
opinion of the Majority Lenders, it has or could reasonably be expected to have a Material
Adverse Effect.
Non-payment
The Borrower fails to pay any sum due under the Finance Documents on the due date for
payment thereof at the place at which it is expressed to be payable provided that such failure
to pay any amount due is due solely to an administrative error or a technical delay in the
transmission of funds or to a Disruption Event and such amount is paid within 2 Business
Days of its due date this clause 18.2 shall not apply to such non-payment.
There is a failure by the Borrower to perform or observe any provision of clause 16.2.
The Borrower fails to perform or observe any obligation, condition or provision binding
on it under the Finance Documents (other than those referred to in clauses 18.2 and
18.3) and, except where such failure is not capable of remedy (when no such notice
shall be required) such failure continues for 5 Business Days after the earlier of (a)
written notice of such failure requiring such person to remedy the same has been
